scripts.build:dev: cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=dev GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false react-app-rewired build && cross-env REACT_APP_NODE_CDN_ENV=dev  node .
scripts.build:qa: cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=qa GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false react-app-rewired build && cross-env REACT_APP_NODE_CDN_ENV=qa  node .
scripts.build:pre: cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=pre GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false react-app-rewired build && cross-env REACT_APP_NODE_CDN_ENV=pre  node .
scripts.build:prod: cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=prod GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false react-app-rewired build && cross-env REACT_APP_NODE_CDN_ENV=prod  node .
